data.name: Textbound Tales
data.detailed_description:
Textbound Tales is a text-driven roleplaying adventure for up to 4 players where every decision influences the world around you!

Travel across the continent of Sudaer and discover all the different stories, characters and locations it has to offer.
Make decisions together with your friends and decide what kind of band of ragtag misfits you want to be!

Will you help that strange traveller? Or will you take the few coins he has left and use them to buy yourself a nice house in the city of Thydaal?
It's all up to your party! But beware, maybe that traveller isn't just a weak old man... You never know when a powerful wizard might be playing a trick on you!

WISHLIST TEXTBOUND TALES NOW!

THE CONTINENT OF SUDAER

From infected forests to thriving steampunk cities, Sudaer is a continent filled with fantastical creatures and stories. As you travel the world you'll explore dungeons, get into fights and meet all sorts of people. The way you choose to handle these situations will have a significant impact on the future of the continent.

GAME FEATURES


  • 20 unique locations filled with quests.
  • 6 Playable characters each with their own unique influence on the adventures you'll encounter.
  • 4-player co-op support.
  • Thousands of choices waiting to be made.
  • An enormous cast of NPCs with their own problems and stories.
  • Innumerable enemies to defeat.
  • Many customisable locations/houses.
  • Custom soundtracks for every region.
  • One amazing world for you to explore.

data.short_description: Go on adventures! Fight monsters! Talk to strangers! (Have a drink?) Become a hero! Or a villain... Create your party and choose your own path in this text-driven roleplaying adventure for up to 4 players where every decision influences the world around you!
